description: Shuuda appears, demanding for the Rave of Knowledge. He then begins to destroy the graveyard of all the Symphonia warriors, resulting in the collapse of Tremolo Mountain. While Shuda faces off against Shuuda on an invisible floating platform, Elie and Musica are interfered by Poosya and Rugar on the ground. Shuda explains that Gale was a member of the Shadow Guard, which surprises Haru. Shuuda then starts attacking Elie and Musica, using the Explosive Flame Ballet, to aggravate Haru. Elie becomes unconscious from the attack.

titles.title: 決闘! バニッシュフィールド
